Speaking at StackIT´s CloudX summit

June 22, 2023

I have the pleasure and honor of being a speaker at the CloudX Summit event, which will be held from June 26 to 28, 2023. I will have the pleasure of presenting a speech alongside the CEO of SCRM and the Chief Architect.

In the session titled “How to build and run one of Europe’s biggest Loyalty Programs,” we will see… just that :). As for my part, I will show how we do streaming data ingestion at scale.

Global Power Platform Boocamp 2023 Alicante

February 9, 2023

I have the pleasure and honor of being a speaker at the Global Power Platform Bootcamp 2023 event where I will talk about how to handle Big Data in a large company like the one where I am currently working as a Data Architect.

Imagine if you could create a data ingestion architecture that allows you to exploit it in real-time or in batch at will, prepared for AI teams (ultra-clean and versioned data), that scales without limits, and where you don’t have to worry about cleaning the data because it’s literally impossible to ingest garbage. Does it seem impossible to you? Come over, and I’ll share some secrets with you :)
